title: Gab and Juls: Newcastle Disrupting the Premier League?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Don Hutchison take a deep dive on Newcastle’s impressive win at Spurs and current run of form. They also discuss Napoli’s important win away to Roma in Serie A, give the latest on Cristiano Ronaldo and reflect on the amazing career of Franck Ribery after he announces his retirement.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Newcastle's hot run of form; Napoli secure major win at Roma; Cristiano Ronaldo's new reality at Man United
